name: Neon (itch) (Zeno, tlucero)
description:
Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • LMB - Shoot and Switch Dimensions
  • E/R - Restart
  • Full Screen for the Best Experience
A Word From The Author

The following game is made for Geo Jam with the theme "the other side". This game is made in 1 week. No external assets or prewritten scripts are used in this game.

  • Game Developer: Zeno
  • Musician: Thom Lucero
  • Game Engine: Godot
  • Font: Blinker
